about_the_game:
Due to being a small team with limited experience and developing a niche game, the game is still in the early access stage. We kindly ask all esteemed players to forgive any issues or poor quality that may arise. If you can pre order in advance and have sufficient project funds, we can also bring more high-quality content to players. If you haven't pre ordered, please follow us more to see what we will update in the future. If you encounter any problems, please spray lightly. Thank you very much to all the players for their understanding. Thank you very much.

Adventure With Succubus , the adventure of a different world is a 3D adult tower defense fantasy adventure style game. You accidentally traveled to another world and met the Lily. In order to satisfy Lily, you embarked on a fantastic journey of conquering the world and various beautiful girls.

Game features:

3D Anime Character Design for Three Rendering Two

Strategic tower defense battles

Dynamic chest physics

Clothes with adjustable transparency

Rich sex animations

content_descriptors.notes: This game features adult themes, language, and fictional characters in nude scenes. All depicted characters are over 18 years old. The demo version currently only features exposed characters, while the early access or official version will include complete adult content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
